title: Card payment transactions unavailable at some V/Line stations
articleContent:
Card payment transactions were temporarily unavailable at some V/Line stations this morning, Friday 28 June.

This issue has been fixed and access to card payments has been restored.

We apologise for any inconvenience.
articleText:

This issue has been fixed and access to card payments has been restored.

articleDescription: Card payment transactions were temporarily unavailable at some V/Line stations this morning.
